title: Marco Polo
desc: Set in a world of greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, “Marco Polo” is based on the famed explorer’s adventures in Kublai Khan’s court.

content.value: Chin Han, Joan Chen, Zhu Zhu, Tom Wu

episode.title: Descenso
episode.desc: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogotá.

episode.title: The Sword of Simón Bolívar
episode.desc: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

episode.title: The Men of Always
episode.desc: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

episode.title: The Palace in Flames
episode.desc: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

episode.title: There Will Be a Future
episode.desc: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carrillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness, Elisa.

episode.title: Explosivos
episode.desc: Peña and Carrillo close in on Gacha, while Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

episode.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episode.desc: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

episode.title: La Gran Mentira
episode.desc: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

episode.title: La Catedral
episode.desc: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña -- and the Cali Cartel -- have other plans.

episode.title: Despegue
episode.desc: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.

title: Narcos
desc: The true story of Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels fuels this gritty gangster drama series.

content.value: Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart, Laura Linney

title: Shooter
desc: A highly decorated ex-Marine sniper returns to action to foil an assassination plot targeting the president, but soon finds himself framed for murder.

content.value: Rayan Phillepe, Omar Epps, Tom Sizemore

title: House Of Cards
desc: A ruthless politician will stop at nothing to conquer Washington, D.C., in this Emmy and Golden Globe-winning political drama.

title: Designated Survivor
desc: While the conspirators make a surprise move, the FBI scrambles to arrest the ringleader. Kirkman asks Aaron to smoke out the White House traitor.

content.value: Kiefer Sutherland, Maggie Q, Kal Penn

title: Ozark
desc: A financial adviser drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder $500 million in five years to appease a drug boss.

title: Crown
desc: This drama follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

content.value: Claire Foy, Matt Smith, Jared Hamilton

title: 13 Reasons Why
desc: After a teenage girl's perplexing suicide, a classmate receives a series of tapes that unravel the mystery of her tragic choice.

title: Death Note
desc: Light Turner finds a supernatural notebook and uses it to mete out death, attracting the attention of a detective, a demon and a girl in his class.

title: Little Evil
desc: In this horror-comedy, a recently married man who wants to bond with his stepson begins to fear that the boy is a demon.

content.value: Rayan Phillepe, Omar Epps, Tom Sizemore

title: Orange Black
desc: A privileged New Yorker ends up in a women's prison when a past crime catches up with her in this Emmy-winning series from the creator of Weeds.

title: Aditi Mittal
desc: Trailblazing comic Aditi Mittal mixes topical stand-up with frank talk about being single, wearing thongs and the awkwardness of Indian movie ratings.

content.value: Kiefer Sutherland, Maggie Q, Kal Penn

title: Fauda
desc: A top Israeli agent comes out of retirement to hunt for a Palestinian militant he thought he'd killed, setting a chaotic chain of events into motion.

title: The Mist
desc: Trapped by a mysterious fog, residents of a Maine village discover that it hides nightmarish creatures. A new series based on Stephen King's novella.

content.value: Claire Foy, Matt Smith, Jared Hamilton

title: The Siege
desc: Besieged by overwhelming enemy forces, Irish soldiers on a U.N. peacekeeping mission in Africa valiantly defend their outpost in this true story.
